Package collection

Class CollectionHandler

java.lang.Object
collection.CollectionHandler
public class CollectionHandler extends Object
A class that manages a collection. Has methods for all interactions with it and also handles collection's construction/deconstruction.

    • load

      public void load()
      A method to load collection from a file. Invokes StorageHandler.load(Class) and constructs collection. Afterwards it invokes checkIds(PriorityQueue).

    • save

      public void save() throws IOException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException

      IOException - if there was an exception writing info in file

      value - a value to be validated
      Returns:
      validated and converted value

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • checkIds

      public Long checkIds(PriorityQueue<MainCollectible> collection) throws InvalidCollectionException
      Checks ids of collection to make sure there aren't any duplicates
      Parameters:
      collection - collection which ids need to be checked
      Returns:
      the highest id
      Throws:
      InvalidCollectionException - if there were duplicate ids
